body.label: Recto, left side (column c)
body.value:
1. Work on the locking bolt, erection of the pillars and fastening of the
  2. locks; work at the cabinet and fastening
  3. of the doors, repairs on the ṭabaqa. Wages of
  4. five days owed to al-Riḍā, the carpenter.
  5. Paid for the purchase of the lumber for the door and (additional) lumber,
  6. 25¼. Half of a palm tree, 8½. Transportation, ¼. Sawing, ¼. Transportation of a prop, ½.
  9. (9-10) On the second day, lumber, 4½. Pieces (of wood), ropes, and a board, 10¾.
  11. (11-12) 2 main boards, 1½. Another board, ¾. Another board, 1¾. Transportation, ½.
  13. (13-15) (Nails) falāfilī, 1½. A plate, 1. A fastening part(?), 1¾. Qawāʾimī (nails), 1 raṭl, 1¾. Total, 106.
  16. (16-17) Locks, 8½; nails for the carvings(?), 3. A water carrier, 1½.
  18. (18-20) Transportation, ½.
  21. (21-24) Marwān, 1½. One sixth of a board, and the locking bolt of the broken door, 3½. Four …. Marwān, for sifting clay, 1½. For digging and for two props, 5. The dealer in gypsum, 5.
  25. …. 34⅓. Total ….

body.label: Recto, right side (column b)
body.value:
1. (1-2) The fourth day, work at the locking bolt, 7¼; repair of …. Water, 1⅓; a meal, ¾.
  2.  
  3. (3-4) The fifth day …., 3½. Lime, from the slave of al-Faqīh, 3. Water, 3⅓.
  4.  
  5. (5-6) Gypsum and carrying it to the site, 16½. Total, 117.
  6.  
  7. Accounting of the day when the dūr al-qāʿa and the water reservoirs were made:
  8. (8-12) 100 bundles of reeds, 5. One quarter of a hundred palm branches, 1½. Nāshūsh, 1¾. Hire of its ceiling-maker, ½. Transportation, ½. A prop, 1½. The wages of al-Riḍā, 12.
  9.  
  10.  
  11.  
  12.  
  13. 1½ raṭls nails, paid to al-Faqīh, 2¾.
  14. Paid by me, one raṭl, 1¾, plus
  15. (15-16) three and a half wiqiyyas, ½, and one raṭl of jāraʾidī (nails), 1¾ + ⅓.
  16.  
  17. 2 qinṭārs of gypsum to fasten the staircase (made of) palm trees,
  18. 1½.
  19. Sawing and carrying the props and hire of the ladder, 1⅓.
  20. Hire of the props …. and its transportation, ¼, paid to al-Riḍā ….
  21.  
  22. Hire of the props for the locking bolt and its transportation, 4.
  23. Gypsum, 12.

Margin:

  1. 1. Total, ….

body.label: Verso, right side (column d)
body.value:
1. The accounting of the paver: The first day, 5.
  2. (2-3) The second day, 7½. Water, 1¾. Gypsum, 29. Ḥamīd and …. 29. Paper,
  3.  
  4. ½.
  5. The third day: Al-Riḍā, for ropes, 5.
  6. (6-8) Gypsum, paid to him, 10½. Wages, 2½, plus …. Plus ….
  7.  
  8.  
  9. (9-10) The third day, 5 ¼. Friday, ʿAlī, the kneader (?), 6¾.
  10.  
  11. (11-12) Floor tiles of the staircase, 26. The balance owed by al-Faqīh, 18. 
  12.  
  13. (13-14) Gypsum, 12. Also gypsum, one third of a qinṭār, heaping, 20½(?).
  14.  
  15. (15-16) Water during the two days, 3. Wages for two days, for the staircase, 15,
  16.  
  17. (17-18) (i.e.) 7½ for one day. Water, 1. Two vertical main pillars, 4¼.
  18.  
  19. Half a day, 7½. Water, 1½.
  20. (20-21) Plus, as detailed, 2½, 1½, 4½ …. Total …. Plus, 6. Total, 257½.
